Auth.title: Login
Auth.description: Sign in for order tracking and management, data prefilling and a better overall experience.

error.Configuration: We have encountered a configuration problem on our side. Please contact us if the problem persists.
error.AccessDenied: We have encountered an access problem on our side. Please contact us if the problem persists.
error.Verification: The provided verification code is invalid. Please try again.

Auth.name: Full Name

AuthVerify.title: Verification
AuthVerify.description: We have sent an e-mail with verification code to {email}. Please copy and paste the code or type it below.

VerificationEmail.subject: Sign in to Pixea
VerificationEmail.preview: Use code {code} to verify your e-mail address and log in.
VerificationEmail.title: Login verification code
VerificationEmail.description: Your verification code is below - copy and paste or type it on the "Verification" screen to log in.
VerificationEmail.warning1: This code is only valid for 1 hour. After it expires, please request a new one.
VerificationEmail.warning2: If you did not request this e-mail, you can safely ignore it.

404.title: Page not found
404.description: You either entered in a wrong URL or the page does not exist.
